< p > U.S. President Donald Trump signed into law on Thursday a bill that [V: would] ease rules on most banks for the first time since the 2007 - 2009 financial crisis.</p >

< p > U.S. President Donald Trump signed into law on Thursday [ARG0: a bill] [R-ARG0: that] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: ease] [ARG1: rules on most banks] [ARGM-TMP: for the first time since the 2007 - 2009 financial] crisis.</p >
